heading.sub: Every person has dreams, we can help you to fulfill yours working with us

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.sub: Make a videogame in which users are real owners of their assets, are rewarded for their effort and time spent playing the game

premises.title: Premises
premises.text1: First and foremost a videogame should be fun and enjoyable
premises.text2: The balance in blockchain videogame economics must be meticulously careful
premises.text3: We believe that eSports are and will be the driving force in the industry and thats why our videogames are design to be highly competitive

games.title: Games
games.sub: We have several videogames but we are focused on working on Mech Infinity, a Battle Royale within the Axie Infinity universe

team.title: Equipo
team.sub: The best games come from the best teams
